ROW.NAME: 月度行业增值税分析表

ROW.DATDSC: select nvl(name,'其他') 行业, max(decode(mm,'01',taxmny,0)) "01", max(decode(mm,'02',taxmny,0)) "02", max(decode(mm,'03',taxmny,0)) "03", max(decode(mm,'04',taxmny,0)) "04", max(decode(mm,'05',taxmny,0)) "05", max(decode(mm,'06',taxmny,0)) "06", max(decode(mm,'07',taxmny,0)) "07", max(decode(mm,'08',taxmny,0)) "08", max(decode(mm,'09',taxmny,0)) "09", max(decode(mm,'10',taxmny,0)) "10", max(decode(mm,'11',taxmny,0)) "11", max(decode(mm,'12',taxmny,0)) "12" from ( select substr(a.yymm,-2) mm,b.typclsid,c.name,sum(taxmny)/[%UNIT] taxmny,sum(sdtaxmny)/[%UNIT] sdtax from tax_taxdata a,v_tax_company b,tax_compclass c where substr(a.yymm,0,4)=decode('[%YYYY]','',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'[%YYYY]') and nvl(b.stat,' ') <> '注销' and a.id=b.id and b.typclsid=c.id(+) [%HYCLS] group by a.yymm,b.typclsid,c.name ) group by nvl(name,'其他')
